sense.def:
The provision of something
je zagotavljanje nečesa nekomu ali dejanje, s katerim poskrbimo, da nekdo nekaj dobi.

seg.quote: ...helping needy people by the provision of food, clothing, and shelter.

sense.def:
To make provision for a future need
pomeni urediti pogoje, da bo pozneje poskrbljeno za določene potrebe.

seg.quote: She did not make any provision for her children.

sense.def:
A provision in an agreement or law
je del pogodbe ali zakona; v njem je predpisan način reševanja nečesa.

seg.quote: The Government had still to agree on the provisions of the Bill.
We set out with enough provisions for the long trip.
